oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Participation in an organic farm and food network – experiences of HNEE team (Pre-Conference)
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Münchhausen, von, Susanne
Häring, Anna Maria
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farm economics
Education, extension and communication
Produce chain management
Germany
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Eberswalde University has a long-term experience in organising a organic farm and food network in the Berlin-Brandenburg region. This presentations highlights the experiences with the participation in the organic farm network of Thünen-Institute (agri benchmark).
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Münchhausen, von, Susanne and Häring, Anna Maria (2014) Participation in an organic farm and food network – experiences of HNEE team (Pre-Conference). Paper at: Pre-Conference "Understanding Organic Farming Worldwide" at the "Organic World Congress", Istanbul, Turkey, 12.-15.10.2014. [Completed]
